carpooling_package

Class Ticket

  • java.lang.Object
    • carpooling_package.Ticket

  • public class Ticket
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the methods that related to The Ticket.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int car_code
      is the code for the specified Car that related to the reserved ticket
      It has a private access modifier.
      double discount
      is the percentage of discount to the subscriber user
      It's a final variable.
      double price
      is the normal price of the one trip without any discount.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ticket() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void check_discount(int user_id)
      This method to check discount because if the user is a subscriber there will a discount by 50%
      Then decrease the number of trips for him by one
      If the user is a non-subscriber, there'll not be a discount.
      void check_valid_car(int user_id, int car_code)
      This method to check if the chosen car is valid which means there is a capacity in it.
      void reserve_ticket(int user_id, int car_code)
      This method is used to reserve a ticket as its name shows
      void writeReview(boolean ok)
      This method to make the user write a review if he wants.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • reserve_ticket

        public void reserve_ticket(int user_id,
                           int car_code)
        This method is used to reserve a ticket as its name shows
        Parameters:
        user_id - is the ID of the passenger
        car_code - is the Code of the specified car.

      • check_valid_car

        public void check_valid_car(int user_id,
                            int car_code)
        This method to check if the chosen car is valid which means there is a capacity in it.
        And if it is valid, The System will make you reserve a ticket then write a review if you want
        If not, So you should take another car.
        Parameters:
        user_id -
        car_code -

      • check_discount

        public void check_discount(int user_id)
        This method to check discount because if the user is a subscriber there will a discount by 50%
        Then decrease the number of trips for him by one
        If the user is a non-subscriber, there'll not be a discount.
        Parameters:
        user_id -

      • writeReview

        public void writeReview(boolean ok)
        This method to make the user write a review if he wants.
        Parameters:
        ok - to check if the user wants to write or not
